long_description: The Patagonia Fiona parka is an exceedingly feminine, urban and lightweight down coat. Wrapped up in its downy warmth, ordering gelato on the palazzo in winter seems a fine choice. Made of recycled windproof polyester and insulated with 800-fill-power premium European goose down; treated with a moisture-shedding Durable Water Repellent finish. Thoughtfully designed, comfortable and cozy, it has princess seaming and an updated quilting pattern with curved, feminine lines. Above-the-knee length keeps you warm, while the 2-way zipper lets you ventilate above or below. Internal draft flap and wrap-around chin guard. On-seam handwarmer pockets and interior drop-in pockets secure valuables. Patagonia Fiona parka has a slim fit.
